Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory227.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Numerous mechanical devices have surrounded the airdrop cabin since Rosetta was away.'}
{3: 'Drones hover around the equipment. Several mechanical arms are sticking out from the sides.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Next up, I'll modify the CUB. I've already prepared the replacement components.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "In order to reduce the burden on your M.I.N.D., I can only approximate its performance according to your previous frame after the calibration. I can't match it perfectly.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "After all, I can't agree with that way of harming yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "If you're clear on what to do, bring it here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Come on.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta leads the CUB toward the mechanical equipment in front of her.'}
{3: 'A mechanical arm extends toward the CUB, waiting to connect.'}
{3: 'The CUB comes to a stop right as it touches the mechanical arm.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Is this one of the deviations you mentioned?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I don't know. I didn't run into anything like this on the way back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Seems like...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta strokes the CUB's crest. The CUB, having shown no willingness to move, suddenly rears up on its hind legs."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's resisting.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The CUB raises one of its front hooves and kicks the mechanical arm away. It turns its head away, its hooves landing on the ground with a heavy thud.'}
{3: 'Seeing this, Rosetta immediately runs toward the CUB to stop it, but it dodges her with ease and then disappears into the snowy forest.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...It still turns out like this in the end.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Good thing I came prepared. Wouldn't want a repeat of what happened to Toniris.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'There might be some side effects, but they will be within our margin of error.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'And with that, Asimov begins typing away on his terminal.'}
{3: 'Rosetta interrupts Asimov as she watches the CUB disappear into the snowy forest.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I took the job. It stands to reason that I should finish it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'After all, no one is better at searching the snowy forest than the Forest Guard.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'If you insist, Leader of the Forest Guard. The additional data could provide us with more ways to optimize the frame.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '(Nods) Leave it to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory95.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'These tracks in the snow are fresh... Given their depth... And the current snowfall...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'It was here roughly five minutes ago.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I need to hurry up... It's getting farther ahead.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta follows the CUB's tracks through the snowy forest. As she makes her way into the forest toward the mountains, the snowstorm becomes more intense, and visibility begins to drop."}
{3: 'Rosetta, who usually maintains her composure, begins to show signs of distress.'}
{3: '—Why did she not let Asimov help her?'}
{3: '—Why does she want to do this all by herself?'}
{3: "—With Asimov's help, maybe..."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No. This is my failure as a guardian. I have to deal with this myself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shaking off the snow on her head, Rosetta continues to chase the CUB deep into the snow forest.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{3: 'All of the tracks lead to an expansive gorge.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The next series of tracks... are on the other side of the gorge...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "If that's the case...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta faces the cliff, then takes a few steps backward.'}
{3: 'She slowly extends her light wings, then charges forward at full speed.'}
{3: 'As she springs and leaps, she unleashes the energy compressed in her wings. The force from the burst sends her flying across the gorge even farther.'}
{3: "After momentarily hovering in the air, the luminescent beams from her light wings gradually fade. The scenery in Rosetta's field of vision begins to move up rapidly."}
{3: 'She pulls out a spear from behind and thrusts. The tip of the spear barely manages to make contact with the cliff face, let alone pierce it.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'Realizing that the distance is not enough, Rosetta aims the spear behind her and unleashes a condensed blast of energy. The force of the blast launches her closer to the opposing cliff face.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "—As a leader, as a knight that guards my comrades, I can't let something this small stand in my way!"}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll show you what I can do!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Using the propulsion from the blast, Rosetta lunges once more at the cliff face.'}

{3: "The spear nails firmly into it as she presses her limbs against it. The spear slices across it, leaving a deep gash as sparks ignite violently from the friction between Rosetta's frame and the cliff face."}
{3: 'Finally coming to a stop, Rosetta looks down at the white abyss below her and slowly breathes a sigh of relief.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{3: "The snowstorm is getting harsher. A spear suddenly appears from beneath the cliff's edge, firmly nailing onto its surface."}
{3: 'Clinging to the spear is an exhausted Rosetta.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "If I were using my old frame, a cliff like this wouldn't have...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Sacrificing mobility for firepower...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I knew this was going to happen. Why did I still do it?', 4: '1'}
{3: '—But she knows exactly why.'}
{3: '—She is acting like this with a sense of resentment.'}
{3: 'Rosetta shakes her head. She grips her spear and continues toward the snowy mountain.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I can't stop here. I'm a knight of the Forest Guard!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '—A guardian for those who are lost.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Knights blaze trails and forge paths to guide their comrades to warmth and safety.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'A knight... A knight must...', 4: '1'}
{3: '—Whether it is the fact that she let her comrades get hurt earlier...'}
{3: '—Or the fact that she cannot steer the centaur module that was once hers...'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's me failing my duty as a knight.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having made her way to the top of the cliff finally, Rosetta parts the wind and snow, only to find the tracks left by the CUB long gone.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Perhaps, I'm no longer worthy of leading the way for everyone... to shoulder the responsibilities of a knight... to guard them...", 4: '1'}
{3: '—That is the source of her resentment.'}
{3: 'Alone in the raging blizzard, Rosetta finally admits what has been festering in her heart.'}
